title: [Large-scale] MOOC-based Blended Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course

context.additional_context: A blended mathematics education program utilizing MOOCs, where practical math concepts are acquired through short learning modules in mobile environments, with in-depth application activities conducted in face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can enhance mathematical problem-solving skills by completing over 5 hours per week of mobile microlearning content via a MOOC platform
Learners can demonstrate statistical analysis skills applicable to real-world job situations through project-based assessments in a blended learning environment
Learners can evaluate the practical value of learning content at 4.5/7 points or higher based on integrated learning experiences combining MOOCs and in-person classes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
